DOC.criteria: 14 year old old Negative pregnancy test No prior pregnancy last beyond 19 6/7 week Minimum 2 week spontaneous medical abortion Minimum 4 week post 2nd trimester surgical abortion No previous IUD insertion No PID last 3 month No current cervicitis Willing followup 12 month IUD string check Active cervical infection Current pregnancy Prior pregnancy beyond 19 6/7 week gestation Known uterine anomaly Fibroid uterus distort uterine cavity Copper allergy/Wilson 's Disease ( Paragard ) Undiagnosed abnormal uterine bleed Cervical uterine cancer
